title: Excellent
text: something different but cool. good vibes and atmosphere. great music. obviously like all clubs there are shady people on occasion heard a girls phone stolen from purse but good night

title: Really Good Irish Pub in Belgium.
text: Really Good Irish Pub in Belgium. Normally I stay away from Irish Pubs when abroad but this is clean, spaceous, beautiful food and access to matches. Perfect for just a bite at lunch nice dinner and they have live music and alcohol with a nice crowd in the evenings if your into that. Restaurant is great

title: Amazing experience
text:
Two things: If youve any walking mobility issues there are definite areas which appear that they cannot
be accessed but overall it is amazing for views and iconic ruins. Wear comfortable shoes. Being water and maybe a hat if too hot. We went Nov 2019 cant imagine doing this in height of summer! it was hot enough in november

title: Worth it for the views
text: Not the friendliest service, but drinks and views are a must! Great experience if youre looking for something to do in the evening, nice relaxing experience away from business of city streets

title: Hub of activity.
text: A great locality to base yourself in. Loads to do restaurants,shops, market near agora and acropolis. Great atmosphere but sadly a reputation for pickpockets so be on your guard (visited Nov 2019)

title: Fun night out
text: Technically was here November 2019. We were planning to go to Lohan across the road but between costs and being denied entry because you had to book online headed to tokyo instead. It saved a good night. Great show music. Bouncer was superaccommodating and we got free drink for 10 euro entry. It was packed that night but Greek people were so nice and friendly. Was an amazing experience as a tourist. Would highly recommend.

title: Amazing night with friends
text: The early bird menu and food werw lovely. Had an amazing meal and lovely environment. there was a spanish guitar playing!

title: One night in heaven
text: I stayed here for a splash of luxury and that is what it was. Food was great, gardens are stunning, slept really well and breakfast was lovely. The spa is gorgeous but I would suggest wearing flip flops as floor was wet and slippy. otherwise it was a fab stay.

title: Great
text: it has a really central location with night life nearby. theres the tram to the airport around the corner. there are large rooms which are very comfortable and breakfast was nice although rooms could use more plugs in them and it was a bit stuffy from heating at night. overall perfect for our stay but lots of steps for people if theu had mobility issues.
